players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, your investigation might have been misled. I think Alice could be the real mafia. Let's consider all evidence."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Diana was killed by the mafia. So Charlie is the only suspect. I vote to arrest Charlie."
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is the mafia. Let's vote him out."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is the mafia. Let's vote him out."
Bob: "Charlie is mafia. I investigated him and found him. Diana was killed by mafia. Alice has no motive. Vote Charlie out."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, your investigation might have been misled. I think Alice could be the real mafia. Let's consider all evidence."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafia. Diana was killed by the mafia. So Charlie is the only suspect. I vote to arrest Charlie."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is the mafia. Let's vote him out."
Charlie: remained silent.
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is the mafia. Let's vote him out."
You: "Charlie is mafia. I investigated him and found him. Diana was killed by mafia. Alice has no motive. Vote Charlie out."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
